{"id":613714756,"lang":"cpp","time":"7 months, 3 weeks","timestamp":1641407397,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"28 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/613714756/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Add Strings","memory":"55.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string addStrings(string num1, string num2) {\n     \n        int n = num1.size()-1;\n        int m = num2.size()-1;\n        string res ;\n        int sum =0 ;\n        int carry =0 ;\n        while(n>=0 || m >=0){\n            int x = n >=0 ? num1[n]-'0':0;\n            int y = m>=0 ? num2[m]-'0':0;\n            sum = (x+y+carry)%10;\n            res = to_string(sum) +res ; \n            carry = (carry+x+y)/10;\n            n--;\n            m--;\n        }\n        if(carry){\n            res = to_string(carry)+ res ;\n        }\n        return res ;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"add-strings"}
